title: Help with New Blue Essence
body: This is the one question that I did not see answered is about the Blue Essence and Champion shards. When the new system starts in the preseason, will the shards be more expensive to upgrade to permanent? (Will it cost 6.5x the current cost to upgrade to permanent or will it be more/less, making it more important to craft them now or later?)

replies.body: AFAIK, the costs are being altered slightly, but not just overall increased. They're working to make essence more meaningful across the board. I don't believe everything is just going up in cost, but the values will be balanced a bit I think. With that being said, I don't actually have any concrete info on this at the moment.

Greetings!

If I may bother you for a moment: It is 110% guaranteed that the 6,5 multiplier on existing Blue essence will not be changed?
Like, for example, if I have 100 BE, that WILL become 650 BE come pre-season, and without any "you'll get 500 BE"-changes made at the last moment?

I've been trying to get this confirmed, but so far no one seems able or willing.

It's been confirmed a few different places, the first one that comes to mind is the **[Preseason Update FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ)**. Check out that FAQ and do a ctrl+F for 6.5 and you see the details ^_^

Thank you!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  {{sticker:katarina-love}} 

>To ensure your existing blue essence is not losing value during the transition to the newer, bluer essence, **it will be multiplied by 6.5** and added to your IP balance to calculate your total blue essence value.

How the heck did I even miss that one. >_<
Likely just the consistent drooling over the "what are you doing for players who'll have tons of BE with nothing to spend it on?"-part...

Again, thank you - I shall immediately proceed to dump all of my remaining 124.862 IP into random champion tokens for disenchanting. :)
_After all, the math does state a 2.000 BE gain per 10x tokens on average._


...or I will buy all dem tokens as soon at the ~~Loot~~ Store-tab is working again. :|

Everything is being scaled by 1.6x I believe so it will feel normal with your BE being 1.6x more, it could be a different number though.

Ex.
Champion shard orig. pric x 1.6 = new price. While your new BE is (I believe) X1.6 with x being replaced with your IP.

I remember reading about everything being x 1.6

This has not been posted anywhere that I can find, I would like a concrete answer, so please post your source. However, your BE calculation you have is incorrect. It is IP + (BE x 6.5) for just the IP and BE you already have. IP has a 1:1 ratio.

"To ensure your existing blue essence is not losing value during the transition to the newer, bluer essence, it will be multiplied by 6.5 and added to your IP balance to calculate your total blue essence value."
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ
